data.event: Sheikh Mansur was based here in 1786.

event.title: January 3, 1995, during the course of the First Chechen War, Shali was repeatedly bombed

data.event: On January 3, 1995, during the course of the First Chechen War, Shali was repeatedly bombed with cluster bombs by Russian jet aircraft.
Вступил в силу 30 ноября 2005 г.. Опубликован: База данных "Консультант-плюс".
